title: ISic003525. I.Sicily inscription 003525
body:
Facsimile Images

P(ublio) · Avillio · P(ubli) · f(ilio) ·
Pudentino
vixit · a(nnis) · XI · m(ensibus) · VI
P(ublius) · Avillius · Zosi-
5mus · P(ublio) Avillio Pudenti ·
Fl(aviae) · Meviae · Merope · fec(it) ·

Apparatus criticus

Text based upon Bitto 2001 with photograph

English translation

To Publius Avillius Pudentinus, son of Publius, who died at 11 years, 6 months. Publius Avillius Zosimus set this up for Publius Avillius Pudens and Flavia Mevia Merope.

commentary

bibliography

  • 2005.0668 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • 18 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000029
  • Orsi 1916 174-175 fig.40 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001701
  • Solin 2005 197-198 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001423
